LanguageData.AirConditioning.label: кондиціонери
LanguageData.AirConditioning.description: Будуйте кондиціонери для комфорту в спекотну погоду, або створюйте морозильні камери для зберігання продуктів.

AirConditioning.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->visited the hottest town on the planet
subject_story->worked at the ice caps, in an interstellar warehouse kept near to absolute zero
subject_story->learned all about air conditioning and freezers, then returned home

LanguageData.Autodoors.label: автоматичні двері
LanguageData.Autodoors.description: Створюйте автоматичні двері, які самі відкриваються коли хтось наближається, нікого не гальмуючи.

Autodoors.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was recruited by a robotics security firm, opening the door to a career as an automation tester
subject_story->worked very hard to ensure the doors made a satisfying 'hiss' when they opened or closed

LanguageData.Batteries.label: акумулятори

Batteries.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->discovered that an acid lake on the leaden shores of a deathworld worked as a natural battery
subject_story->was in charge of maintaining the life support if the colony lost power
subject_story->worked in the scrapworlds, repairing machines and batteries

LanguageData.BiofuelRefining.label: переробка біопалива
LanguageData.BiofuelRefining.description: Конструювання перегінних апаратів для отримання хімічного палива з органіки, наприклад деревини або харчової сировини.

BiofuelRefining.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->was trapped when a generation ship lost power. [ANYPAWN_pronoun] used [ANYPAWN_possessive] knowledge of refining to turn human remains into biofuel and restart the engines
subject_story->used automated biorefineries to begin the long terraforming process on an iceworld
subject_story->started a distillery to make moonshine but, realizing it was undrinkable, sold it as chemfuel instead

LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.label: енергія віддачі
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.description: Дозволяє конструювати автоматичну та напівавтоматичну вогнепальну зброю, наприклад самозарядні та автоматичні пістолети.

BlowbackOperation.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->utilized machine pistols in the trench fighting that overtook the planet
subject_story->sold low-powered autopistols to law enforcement in the orbitals
subject_story->crafted blowback-operated guns for near-sighted conscripts

LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: покращене освітлення
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Build powerful outdoors lights. Additionally, customize the color of electric lights and reduce their power consumption by half. This does not affect sun lamps.

ColoredLights.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->installed floodlights all around the prison world's many security perimeters
subject_story->made sure that the planet's dark side was well-lit
subject_story->moved into running concerts for interstellar troubadours, specializing in controlling the ship's massive lighting rigs

LanguageData.Electricity.label: електроенергія
LanguageData.Electricity.description: Використовуйте силу електроенергії для сотень різних задач.
LanguageData.Electricity.discoveredLetterText: Ваша колонія приручила стихію, яку чужинці називають "електроенергією". З його допомогою можна кардинально змінити життя ваших колоністів.\n\nТепер вам доступна вкладка "Енергія" меню "Проєктування". У ній ви знайдете генератори, кабелі та інші електричні пристрої. Вкладка "Енергія" також відображає електричну мережу підключені до неї генератори та іншу електрику.

Electricity.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was struck by lighting and became determined to harness it
subject_story->created the first generator and lightbulb on a medieval world
subject_story->was executed on a feudal world for the blasphemy of creating light

LanguageData.Firefoam.label: протипожежна піна
LanguageData.Firefoam.description: Створюйте капсули з протипожежною піною - автоматичні протипожежні пристрої, які розпорошують протипожежну піну при контакті з полум'ям.

Firefoam.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->headed up an agency promulgating fire safety to the whole population
subject_story->was saved by the poppers when an oil fire spiraled out of control

LanguageData.FlakArmor.label: броня
LanguageData.FlakArmor.description: Одяг з вшитими металевими бронепластинами дає захист від куль та уламків, але його вага трохи ускладнює пересування.

FlakArmor.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->supplied flak armor to the militias that ran the cities
subject_story->learned to sew metal plates into clothing, to protect kin from the roving gangs
subject_story->survived a rifle bullet thanks to the metal plate sewn into the breast pocket

LanguageData.FoamTurret.label: пінні турелі
LanguageData.FoamTurret.description: Дозволяє споруджувати турелі, що розпорошують протипожежну піну під час активації.

FoamTurret.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->redesigned gun turrets to put out fires, not create them
subject_story->incorporated heat sensors and foam ejectors into a standard turret chassis
subject_story->was praised after installing cheap foam turrets in public areas and saving many lives

LanguageData.GasOperation.label: відведення порохових газів
LanguageData.GasOperation.description: Дозволяє конструювати більш просунуту автоматичну та напівавтоматичну вогнепальну зброю: автоматичні дробовики, пістолети-кулемети та ручні кулемети.

GasOperation.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->equipped the special weapons squads of the tyrant's guard with light machine guns
subject_story->supplied several planetary armies with heavy firearms
subject_story->designed new types of high-power gun, still known today

LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: геотермальна енергія
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: Будуйте геотермальні електростанції на вершинах парових гейзерів, щоб забезпечити безперебійне живлення.

GeothermalPower.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->studied steam power and established geothermal plants throughout the region
subject_story->tapped the power of a dormant volcano to power the local grid
subject_story->argued with the local population who wanted to preserve the scenic geysers, not use them for power

LanguageData.Gunsmithing.label: вогнепальна зброя
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.description: Створюйте просту вогнепальну зброю, по типу револьверів, помпових рушниць, гвинтівок з затвором та запальних гранатометів.

Gunsmithing.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->built a unique 12-shot revolver and won shoot-out after shoot-out
subject_story->specialized in simple gunsmithing, providing shotguns and rifles for hunters
subject_story->set up as a gunsmith, achieving fame across the sector

LanguageData.GunTurrets.label: кулеметні турелі

GunTurrets.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked on AI routines, to enable gun turrets to identify friends and foes
subject_story->designed a modular gun turret holster, capable of taking any weapon type
subject_story->disabled the enemy's turrets remotely, before leading the charge

LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: гідропоніка
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Дозволяє вам будувати гідропонні резервуари, щоб вирощувати рослини в приміщеннях, ігноруючи ґрунт або погоду назовні.

Hydroponics.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->joined a generation ship crew as their crop specialist
subject_story->established a hydroponics facility to feed the hungry
subject_story->traveled around, teaching artificial plant growth to new colonists

LanguageData.IEDs.label: саморобні вибухові пристрої
LanguageData.IEDs.description: Будуйте імпровізовані пастки з будь-якого мінометного снаряду.

IEDs.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->disarmed the leftover shells of the war, sending them onto the new frontline as mines
subject_story->came under mortar fire, only surviving by crafting traps from the enemy's many dud shells
subject_story->advocated for the rights of small settlements, where unexploded munitions were a constant peril

LanguageData.Machining.label: механіка
LanguageData.Machining.description: Дозволяє створювати верстати, на яких можна збирати зброю, гранати, укріплену броню чи переробляти мертвих механоїдів.

Machining.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->gathered the remains of dead mechanoids and shredded them for resources
subject_story->quietly built an arsenal of self-made weapons in the basement of a suburban home
subject_story->built machining tables for many gunsmiths, despite being a pacifist

LanguageData.Mortars.label: міномети
LanguageData.Mortars.description: Будуйте міномети, які можуть запускати снаряди на великі відстані, ігноруючи стіни.

Mortars.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was instrumental in the glasshouse siege that overthrew the town council
subject_story->developed a collapsible, lightweight mortar tube for the local police
subject_story->demolished the many derelict buildings from a distance, with explosive shells

LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: поживна паста
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: Створюйте дозатори поживної пасти, які ефективно та автоматично виробляють їжу із сирих харчових продуктів.

NutrientPaste.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked in a factory canteen and devised nutrient paste as a way to avoid all labor
subject_story->lost [ANYPAWN_possessive] taste of smell to disease, so devised a cheap, flavorless nutrient paste
subject_story->advocated for the recycling of all organic matter into nutrient paste, even corpses

LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.label: сухпайки
LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.description: Консервована та герметично упакована їжа, яка не псується. Чудово підходять для подорожей.

PackagedSurvivalMeal.generalRules.rulesS.li: subject_story-> knew, when disaster struck, there were enough packaged meals to survive until rescuers arrived
subject_story->established a social kitchen, which donated survival meals to all outgoing vessels
subject_story->discovered survival meals in the mountains that were hundreds of years old

LanguageData.Prosthetics.label: протезування
LanguageData.Prosthetics.description: Конструювання простих протезів для заміни втрачених кінцівок. Для встановлення потрібен кваліфікований лікар.

Prosthetics.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->had a limb replaced with a prosthetic, to show how easy it was
subject_story->began crafting bespoke fake limbs for the many war veterans in the area

LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.label: димові шашки
LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.description: Димові шашки використовують для встановлення димових завіс.

SmokepopBelt.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked as a hauler for bands, using smokepops for special effects
subject_story->established a defensive smokepop perimeter around the local towns, to keep the wildlife back
subject_story->used smokepop packs to train new firefighters, without the peril of actual fire

LanguageData.SolarPanels.label: сонячна панель
LanguageData.SolarPanels.description: Будівництво сонячних панелей для виробництва електроенергії за допомогою сонячного світла.

SolarPanels.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->studied ways of maximizing the percentage of solar energy captured
subject_story->left on a sundiver to see a fly-by of a star's photosphere

LanguageData.SterileMaterials.label: стерильні матеріали
LanguageData.SterileMaterials.description: Створюйте стерильну плитку, щоб зробити чисті приміщення безпечнішими та ефективнішими для лікування, досліджень та приготування їжі.

SterileMaterials.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->prevented many deaths by insisting on effective, consistent sterilization of all equipment
subject_story->started a kibble kitchen which, uniquely for the system, was known to be free of food poisoning
subject_story->established a decorative tile factory, with a sideline in medical equipment and sterile tiles

LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: електронно-променева трубка

TubeTelevision.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->designed a faux-retro television set that could pick up interstellar signals
subject_story->moved into broadcasting, producing programmes just for the archaic tube televisions
subject_story->ensured that everyone knew the dangers of cathode ray tubes

LanguageData.WatermillGenerator.label: гідрогенератор
LanguageData.WatermillGenerator.description: Гідрогенератор перетворює течію на стабільне джерело електроенергії.

WatermillGenerator.generalRules.rulesStr.li: subject_story->watched twigs and leaves get pulled downstream and envisioned the power there
subject_story->hooked cabling up to an ancient flour mill on a feudalworld
subject_story->beached a paddle steamer on a ruinworld's shores and converted it into a watermill
